context_text: <B> along with it makes no difference you can use abortion you can use the gun group you can use the smoking group i either like or don't like one so they try to force their issues i don't like this so i'm going to tell you that it's bad and we should ban it so to speak / <A> mhm / <B> no matter what it is and to me that's the censorship in the schools with some of the books and i don't advocate pornography but just where do you draw the line as to how people you know what i'm saying how people uh opinion have their opinions on something what is good for you is good for something else uh is bad for somebody else / <A> mhm / <B> i was at a protest a few months ago driving by and asked the ladies what they were protesting about and they said they were protesting the dirty movie business up on the corner this was in a mid missouri town and they asked me what i thought about it and i said well i don't go there but do you think you have the right to take these people's constitutional rights away from them instead of censoring it it broke the group up / <A> mhm
